Hmm.  I may start Wish List Part 4 on Sunday or Monday, depending on 
how things go.  What's part 4 about?  Features for Gladiator:Beyond 
Freedom.  This should be fun because virtually no one has played it 
(hint at FSGames people, make the demo available).  I expect tlaks 
about things in general we would expect.

Once we finish the Wish List Topic, I plan on starting discussion 
about 'The Fifty Project' [I asked Tevilvido about this] and 
discussion about the Tournament rules.  I do not expect much 
discussion about those two topics.
